text: Ahitub became the father of Zadok. Zadok became the father of Shallum.
Judas sent men to spy on the camp, and they reported to him: “All the Gentiles around us have rallied to him, making a very large force;
Teaching About Retaliation. “You have heard that it was said, ‘An eye for an eye and a tooth for a tooth.'
When they arrived at the house of the synagogue official, he caught sight of a commotion, people weeping and wailing loudly.
Rather, new wine must be poured into fresh wineskins.
and you do not have his word remaining in you, because you do not believe in the one whom he has sent.
So now I tell you, have nothing to do with these men, and let them go. For if this endeavor or this activity is of human origin, it will destroy itself.
